name: Luck of the Draw (LukeMuscat)
description:
There is no sound in this prototype, sorry!

Check out how the game was made right here:

How to play:
  • Spend $10 each turn setting up your revolver by buying and selling items.
  • Each item has firepower and some have an ability. Hover over items to see their ability.
  • Drag items to an empty slot to buy for $3. You can sell them for $1 by dragging them to the sell button (appears when dragging). You can freeze items in the shop by dragging them to the freeze button (appears when dragging)
  • Press end turn to enter a match against another player. Duels play out automatically, and rely on a combination of luck and clever synergies.
  • At the end of the round, you return to the shop to keep improving and building your revolver.
  • Win 7 rounds and you are the victor! Lose 4 rounds, and you are out.
